mapper.select: SELECT s.s_name,m.bill_code,m.bill_date,m.bill_state,m.c_name,m.c_phone,m.address,m.savingsno,m.stored_type,m.stored_value,m.give_amount,m.user_name,m.remarks FROM member_stored m LEFT JOIN store s ON s.`s_id` = m.s_id ORDER BY m.bill_date
select m_id, s_id, bill_code, bill_date, c_name, c_phone, bill_state, savingsno, stored_value, give_amount, stored_type, user_name, address, remarks from asms.member_stored where m_id = #{mId}
select m_id, s_id, bill_code, bill_date, c_name, c_phone, bill_state, savingsno, stored_value, give_amount, stored_type, user_name, address, remarks from asms.member_stored limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.member_stored(s_id, bill_code, bill_date, c_name, c_phone, bill_state, savingsno, stored_value, give_amount, stored_type, user_name, address, remarks) values (#{sId}, #{billCode}, #{billDate}, #{cName}, #{cPhone}, #{billState}, #{savingsno}, #{storedValue}, #{giveAmount}, #{storedType}, #{userName}, #{address}, #{remarks})

insert into asms.member_stored(s_id, bill_code, bill_date, c_name, c_phone, bill_state, savingsno, stored_value, give_amount, stored_type, user_name, address, remarks) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.billCode}, #{entity.billDate}, #{entity.cName}, #{entity.cPhone}, #{entity.billState}, #{entity.savingsno}, #{entity.storedValue}, #{entity.giveAmount}, #{entity.storedType}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.remarks})

insert into asms.member_stored(s_id, bill_code, bill_date, c_name, c_phone, bill_state, savingsno, stored_value, give_amount, stored_type, user_name, address, remarks) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.billCode}, #{entity.billDate}, #{entity.cName}, #{entity.cPhone}, #{entity.billState}, #{entity.savingsno}, #{entity.storedValue}, #{entity.giveAmount}, #{entity.storedType}, #{entity.userName}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.remarks})
on duplicate key update s_id = values(s_id) , bill_code = values(bill_code) , bill_date = values(bill_date) , c_name = values(c_name) , c_phone = values(c_phone) , bill_state = values(bill_state) , savingsno = values(savingsno) , stored_value = values(stored_value) , give_amount = values(give_amount) , stored_type = values(stored_type) , user_name = values(user_name) , address = values(address) , remarks = values(remarks)
mapper.update:
update asms.member_stored
s_id = #{sId},
bill_code = #{billCode},
bill_date = #{billDate},
c_name = #{cName},
c_phone = #{cPhone},
bill_state = #{billState},
savingsno = #{savingsno},
stored_value = #{storedValue},
give_amount = #{giveAmount},
stored_type = #{storedType},
user_name = #{userName},
address = #{address},
remarks = #{remarks},
where m_id = #{mId}
